item.title: Journal 2022-07-01
item.description: So the first half of the year consists of the lockdown, the work-from-home, and the generally slacking of because of my mental status. This should not continue. From the first day of the second half of the year, I will try to do more, like writing useless journals about what I do. This shall be the first, and this is what I did today: Introduced my son to the Chinese version of Hikaru No Go.
